text: Ida Lupino (February 4, 1918 â€“ August 3, 1995) was an English-American author, director and actress. She appeared in almost sixty movies and directed seven others. She was also in television series, including The Donna Reed Show and Gilligan's Island. She retired from acting at sixty. Ida died in Los Angeles when she suffered a stroke at age seventy-seven.
